basics.summary: Building the Internetâ€“also hammocking, pulling shots of espresso, jamming to indie folk, critiquing postmodern literature and occasionally jogging. Someday I hope to speak at conferences and write web standards. I love creating with new technologies and with smart teams.

work.summary: Xamarin provides development tools to build and test native mobile apps, including Xamarin Platform, Xamarin Test Cloud, & Xamarin Insights.
highlights: Designed and constructed a conference website used daily by more than 1200 attendees.
Managed a live video feed viewed in 90 countries.
Presented sortable and filterable information for more than 225 consulting partners.
Launched a student promotion which brought in several thousand new leads.
Provided lead tracking insights to support the sales team as they exceeded all 2014 sales goals.
Assessed polyfills and frameworks to determine the future of the technology stack.

work.summary: Granade Technology Solutions, a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner, provides IT Support and IT consulting for all of your technology needs.
highlights: Migrated client sites to the C# DNN framework.
Designed and developed repsonsive websites with the Laravel MVC framework.

work.summary: The ACLU is our nation's guardian of liberty, working daily in courts, legislatures and communities to defend and preserve the individual rights and liberties that the Constitution and laws of the United States guarantee everyone in this country.
highlights: Designed, developed and published a WordPress-based website.
Designed an inventory management web application.
Assessed feasibility of integrating Delphi applications with a new production database system.

work.summary: OIT provides centralized computing services and resources to the Auburn University community.
highlights: Met with clients to draft project specifications.
Developed websites, for Auburn University and others, using the ASP.NET MVC framework.
Designed university-wide templates and user authetication components.
